nodes.text: Thank you for meeting me here this late at night. I really appreciate it.
I'm so glad to meet you here. I've been meaning to talk to you.
There you are! Thanks for coming.
Oh - it's you!
So it is.
I'm glad we're meeting like this.
So what's going on with you?
I've done research and talked to Esme and Chef Kinah about the Nights of the Dead. There's a way to speak with someone who has passed through the veil of life.
I'm going to the Catacombs to talk to my father's ghost.
So why did you ask to meet with you here besides the fact that I'm charming, witty, and fun to be around?
So what did you want to talk to me about?
Tomorrow night, I'm going to the Paladin Memorial to try to speak with the ghost of my father. It's dangerous, so I wanted someone to know where I was going in case I don't return.
Please, if something happens to me, you can tell everyone what I was doing and where I went. I don't want them worrying about me.
Why would you risk your life for this? You don't need your father's or anyone else's opinion to live your own life. Stop looking for approval from others.
You need to do because you want to do them, not because someone else thinks you should do them - or not.
I know. That's why I'm doing this. I want to stop wondering what my father would think of me and my life. I need answers, not doubts.
Sure, I'll do that. Take care when you're down there - I don't want to have to rescue you.
Thanks, Shawn, I knew I could count on you to support me.

options.text: Offer to Go With Thomas to Catacombs

nodes.text: Would you like me to go with you? It would be safer.
You know how dangerous the Catacombs are... Would you really risk your life to help me speak with my father's ghost?
Sure - what else are friends for?
Thank you, Shawn. I've never had a friend like you.
There's no one else quite like me.

nodes.name: Thomas' Father
nodes.description: Thomas wants to speak with his father's ghost in the Catacombs. Chef Kinah helped him find a way to speak with ghosts. Now I am meeting him in Darla's Wing on the last Night of the Dead to make final plans.

nodes.text: Meet me here in two nights' time after eight on the last of the Nights of the Dead. We can make our plans then.
Meet me here tomorrow after eight in the evening. We can make our plans then.

options.text: Talk About the Nights of the Dead

nodes.text: I don't see any ghosts around here.
No, I think there is something in here that keeps the ghosts away. It's so peaceful - it's like a refuge from care.
Is that why you come here?
Mostly I come because of my father. I feel very close to him here.
This is a painting of him.
I keep asking myself, "What would father think of me now?" Would he be disappointed? Would he be angry? I tried so hard all my life to be worthy of him.
I'm sure he'll be proud of you.
I need to know. I have to find out.
So how do you talk to Ghosts? All they seem to do is moan at me when I try.
You should speak with Chef Kinah. She knows how to make a charm that allows people to speak with ghosts.
You know, I would do anything for you.
You are very kind, Shawn. You are a true friend.
I could be more than just a friend...
Perhaps you could, Shawn... someday.
See you tomorrow.
Good night, Shawn. Sweet dreams.
